WorkItem.Description:
As a tank, I have a seperate 'Hitcap' gearset for interruption duty. I use Batch Tools to optimize it along with my main set and this works well so far.
Â 
But now I obtained a second Soul Blade to reforge and enchant it specifically for Hitcap. Unfortunately, I could not find a way to tell Rawr. Is there a chance to fix this?
WorkItem.Summary: [Feature Request.Items] Support for multiple item copies

Comments.Message:
See the Optimizer Documentation on Blue Diamonds. You can tell it that you have two specific ones available with different enchants/reforgings/gemmings



** Closed by Jothay 25.02.2011 09:24
Yeah, but the Batch Tools still don't recognize it as two copies. They use one of them for all sets.
Is this still an issue since Interrupts no longer require HIT?
EG... are there any *other* use-cases for this feature?
Yes there are other use cases for this. I still have plans to implement this, probably in one of the next few versions if nothing more important comes up.
